snippet: An index of sales and hiring by service companies indicated that they shrugged off the government shutdown.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its service-sector index rose to 55.4 in October, up from 54.4 in September.
lead_paragraph: An index of sales and hiring by service companies indicated that they shrugged off the government shutdown.

headline.main: Growth in Service Sector Accelerated Last Month
headline.print_headline: Growth in Service Sector Accelerated Last Month
